definition: variant of 是[shi4]/(used in given names)
abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
lit. right and wrong, crooked and straight (idiom); fig. merits and demerits/pros and cons
unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)
to incite a quarrel (idiom); to sow discord between people/to tell tales/to make mischief
to incite a quarrel (idiom); to sow discord between people/to tell tales/to make mischief
to determine right and wrong based on public opinion (idiom)/Public opinion will judge what's right and wrong.
pinyin: shi4 fei1 zi4 you3 gong1 lun4

definition: unable to distinguish right and wrong (idiom)

sentences.english: I have to be in the city.
sentences.chinese: 我是非待在城市不可的人。

sentences.english: What are the non-visual qualities of the design?
sentences.chinese: 什么是非视觉的设计特点？

sentences.english: Contrastive study of syntax structure of yes-no questions in Russian and Chinese is made in part two.
sentences.chinese: 第二部分主要是俄汉语是非问句的句法结构对比研究。

sentences.english: They are African-and-American kids, and their coming to D.C.
sentences.chinese: 他们都是非裔美籍的孩子，此次来环境保护署总部。

sentences.english: We use it to describe someone who confuses right and wrong deliberately.
sentences.chinese: 我们用它来形容那些故意颠倒是非的人。

sentences.english: He knows good from evil, fight from wrong.
sentences.chinese: 他能识别善恶，辨别是非。

sentences.english: It is a non-committed type of relationship.
sentences.chinese: 这种关系是非承诺关系的一种类型。

sentences.english: It’s where we shared cigarettes and gossip.
sentences.chinese: 这就是我们分享香烟和绯闻是非的地方。

sentences.english: We should distinguish between right and wrong.
Meguiar's pure polishes are non-abrasive and totally safe for your car's finish.
sentences.chinese: 美光的纯抛光剂是非研磨性的，而且对漆面绝对安全。
其它的音节都是非重音。

sentences.english: The rank-sum test is an important non-parametric statistical method.
sentences.chinese: 秩和检验法是非参数统计方法中的一种重要方法。

sentences.english: At what age are children able to distinguish between right and wrong?
sentences.chinese: 儿童到什么年龄才能明辨是非？

sentences.english: But I won't give up without a fight.
sentences.chinese: 现在，我甚至无法辨别是非。

sentences.english: As long as he knows right from wrong, is a good person and is happy.
sentences.chinese: 只要他能分清是非，做个好人并且开开心心就好。

sentences.english: I have been acting contrary to all my sense of right;
sentences.chinese: 我的行为违背了我的是非观。

definition: abbr. for 非洲[Fei1 zhou1], Africa
to not be/not/wrong/incorrect/non-/un-/in-/to reproach or blame/(colloquial) to insist on/simply must
to throw out/to get rid of
half/half and half/both ... and .../just as much ... as .../equally
